body_html:
joel-shor: "The Dataset API folks are trying to make MakeIterator more standard. Currently, it seems that you are passing the initialization Op where a Tensor is expected. If instead you store the initialization op somewhere (like a collection) and pass the input Tensor instead, things should work."

sleighsoft: "I have found a good solution to circumvent that problem."

@sleighsoft, what is the solution you found for this?
